channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Visual Form Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Visual Form Builder

item.title: CVE-2021-24514|2024-08-03T19:35:19.892Z -- unknown -- visual%20form%20builder
item.description: The Visual Form Builder WordPress plugin before 3.0.4 does not sanitise or escape its Form Name, allowing high privilege users such as admin to set Cross-Site Scripting payload in them, even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
